title: 148863706.everyone Has An Opinion
excerpt: Which means that the only useful way to get a useful opinion is to ask lots of people and to look for patterns.

children.text: Which means that the only useful way to get a useful opinion is to ask lots of people and to look for patterns.
Because, if you’re asking for feedback from anyone, almost everyone will have feedback to share.
Good feedback. Bad feedback. A little of both.
The only way to know for sure that what you’re getting isn’t a fluke is to ask around.
